features: [TANKLESS DESIGN] This compact steam cleaner for home use has a built-in 3.3-foot water inlet hose, which can insert into the external bucket as a water source. Have fun with the continuous and steady natural steam. No need to hold heavy and bulky tank on hand!
[1700W HIGH POWER] Instant Steam Tech makes steam be ready in 20 seconds, up to 221℉(close to nozzle), melting the greasy dirt and clean with the power of 3.5Bar pressurized steam.

[PREMIUM QUALITY] Thickened ABS shell reduces handheld weight for portability. The built-in evaporator and electromagnetic pump are all made of 304# stainless steel, which is durable and will accompany you for many years.

[SAFETY DESIGN & TIPS] Designed with Overheat Protection, Leakage Protection for safety in use. Tips: (1) Use tap water WITHOUT detergent; (2) Descale regularly for clean steam under instructions of the manual.

[BUYERS TO KNOW & WARRANTY] Before leaving the factory, each unit will be tested, so there will be water traces on the water inlet hose. 1-year warranty: FREE replacement for any quality problems by non-human reasons.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Advantages of Hapyvergo Steam Cleaners Just Ready In 20-40 Seconds Only need 30s to get steady steam. Note: The steam's temp drops quickly when it comes in contact with air. It is warm 2 inches away from the nozzle. Why Choose Tankless Design? No need to wait frequently for refilling No need to hold a heavy water tank. Use bottles or buckets as water source Suitable for Long hours of work High Pressure Cleaning Up to 50PSI powerful steam can greatly improve the efficiency of cleaning, some dirt in the crevices can not be hidden! Large Operation Radius 5'11" Power Cord + 8'2" Steam Hose Large areas can be cleaned without the need to change power outlets frequently!
Bright Up Your Home Again With Hapyvergo Steam Cleaners!

Previous page Be More Careful Steam cleaned areas do not leave substances harmful to children or pets. Easier Cleaning You can hold the steam cleaner or place it on the floor or table and simply hold the steam gun. Wider Application Without Brush: Deodorize Nylon Brush: Normal Dirt Brass Brush: Stubborn Greasy Dirt Car Detailing Clean greasy dirt from the engine Deodorize the interior of the car Clean surface stains on leather 5'11" Power Cord + 8'2" Steam Hose Don't worry about the length limitations that make it difficult to clean some hard-to-reach places. Next page 1 Chemical-free Steam 2 Compact & Portable 3 Uses Of Different Brushes 4 Car Cleaning 5 Large Operation Radius

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is no joke!
reviews.reviewText: It arrived on time, in a nice black carry case with all the supplies. It literally took me 2 minutes to set this thing up and i had steaming "hot" water shooting out of this thing in no time. It's crazy how hot the water gets when there's no tank reservoir in which I really love about this thing; the endless water supply and don't have to worry about how much water is left. Another thing I really like is that its very compact and easy to take on a trip, especially if your go camping and have a trailer. The hose length is perfect and the nozzle works amazing and has a user friendly trigger to adjust the pressure. The main reason I purchased this is for auto detailing the engine and interior, general use around the house (bathrooms, toilet) and works very well cleaning door/window tracks. I would "highly" recommend this product to anyone that loves to clean, and yes, it's worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I tried this product ro clean my smoker, while it did a good job cleaning, I started ro get a lot of steam out of rhe main body, after a few minutes I noticed the floor where I had sat the machine was wet and when I picked it up, water started ro come out of the machine. Another problem was that when I released the steaming wand, steam kept coming out of it. I had ro squeeze the trigger several times before it shut off. I could not find a phone number ro call to ask about this product. Would nor recommend purchasing one.Seller contact me thru Amazon to replaced the steamer. They did sent me a new one without me having to return the original order. I tested it on my smoker and it did quick work of it with no issues. I was very impressed with it therefore I changed my rating of the product to 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The.rod gets extremely hot so be careful.
reviews.reviewText: I love this little machine. I have baught several steamers and this by far is the best one I have purchased. Awesome machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was skeptical...But gets 5 stars!
reviews.reviewText: periodically, I really need a high temp steam cleaner, so took the chance on this one. I just now used it for the first time...WORTH EVERY PENNY!It was easy to use, maintained consistent steam output, and worked great.my only complaint is that there is not an easy way to drain the water from the inlet hose or tank when finished. I just let it run dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars seems pretty durable
reviews.reviewText: I got this to spot clean some things around the house. It takes a little bit of time to heat up, but it generates quite a bit of steam. I've tried using those steam cleaners that look like vacuum cleaners, but this one is a little nicer because when it runs out of water, I don't have to wait until it cools down, then refill it, then wait until it heats back up. I can just swap out the gallon jug of distilled water. On the flip side, I have to carry around a jug of distilled water, which could tip over if I'm careless. But maybe I'm just not good at steam cleaning ... it doesn't clean as effectively as I was hoping. It has worked fine on those things that just require a little of elbow grease, but it hasn't been effective against some kitchen areas that I haven't been able to clean with detergents and abrasives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This item creates lots of steam, but I'm not sure how. I can hold my hand immediately in front of the steam gun and it is merely lukewarm. You can adjust the setting knob to provide more steam/lower temp or less steam/higher temp, but even at the highest temp, I could still hold my hand -directly- in front of it. Accordingly, it did not, and could not, dissolve the grease from my range hood or oven, which is the purpose for which I bought it. It is a wonderful idea, and came nicely packaged with accessories and a carrying case, but it was just not fit for purpose. I would call it more of a mini pressure washer vs. a steamer. Since it didn't work as described, i.e., a steamer, I give it one star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The extender broke first use.
reviews.reviewText: *****UPDATE(2)*****Okay after finally getting some use out of it, I have used the wand with the brass bolt and the all-silver wand. I personally like the one with the brass bolt more. It is a little bit shorter than the all-silver one by about 1-2 inches. I use my steamer very regularly and I tend to go through gaskets every couple of car detail jobs (2-6 hours of extended use at a time). Unfortunately, the issue I ran into now is that the steamer(2) I had bought lost all suction power and would not suck water from the bucket I use. I really do like this steamer but I don't like how unreliable parts of it can be that I cannot fix myself. I have had a total of 3 of these steamers. Steamer(1) I used for about a year and a half with no issues till it wore out, steamer(2) that worked for about 2.5 months, and steamer(3) that this company sent to replace the wrong wand - See first update.*****UPDATE(1)*****Customer service reached out to me asking if they could send me a new extender with the brass screw instead of the silver one it came with. I told them I would be happy to accept it and update my review. They ended up sending me a whole new steamer which is fine but it has the exact same extender. I have not used it yet but I would not doubt I will have the same issue. If this is not updated in the future then it probably did.In the pictures, they show an extender with a brass bolt that attaches to the handle. The extender that came with my order had not a brass bolt. On each end of the extender were adapters screwed in to attach the brush and then to attach to the handle. The first time using it, the GLUE dissolved and steam started leaking out from the adapters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Im addicted to steaming!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and comes with great attachments to clean different surfaces. All you need is a plug an a bucket of water and this thing can go all day - and it heats up INSTANTLY. No waiting for it to get hot or having to refill the tanks. It cleaned everything from mildew in the corner of my shower grout that is absolutely impossible to clean to grime that was built up in my window sills WITHOUT HARSH CHEMICALS. I hope it doesn't break / stop working, I will be so so sad.
I love it. Comes with extra cleaning heads and other accessories. For a great price.

Hola, yo lo compre porque desgraciadamente por un peluche que compre en una tienda se supone de prestigio... Traía chinches e infestaron mi cama y con ayuda del evaporizador, evaporice en rincones qué no podía sacarlas de ahí, con el vapor caliente, salieron quemadas y así he ido terminando con esa plaga, no hay que desesperarse, una vez colocada la, manguera que absorvera el agua que va a evaporizar y sus respectivos aditamentos, chequen que este bien atornillado donde sale la manguera plateada que sale del aparato hacia la pistola para fumigar, si no esta bien apretada con el calor se afloja y se gotea, tiene remedio si desde un principio antes de ponerla a funcionar se aprieta bien, pero que quede bien enroscada no tendrán ningún problema, trabaja de maravilla, primero sale chorritos de agua y después de 45 segundos, comienza a salir vapor, el primer vapor lo avienta fuertisimo, tengan mucho cuidado porque la manguera de metal se calienta y pueden quemarse, la pistola también se va calentando, así que hay que tomarle el tiempo al producto porque sólita te indica cuando es hora de apretar la pistola y que siga saliendo con mucha fuerza, tiene un sonido leve pero si pones atención te lo indica y así haces tus labores super genial, talvez porque como la primera vez que la use, le puse mucha atención en como trabajaba el aparato y que hacía... , me di cuenta que cuenta con un pequeño aviso, parece como si se fuera a apagar, pero no es así, sólita modera su calor,me imagino que tiene como un seguro para que no se queme el aparato, pues a mi me resultó muy útil, fui lavando también otras cosas como baño, azulejos, los filos de humedad qué se acumulan en las orillas del azulejo quedaron geniales, además con el vapor en la cama quemas las chinches y después con la humedad que queda colocas ácido bórico, pero ojo, no se mete ningún liquido ni polvo a la cubeta del agua con la que trabaja el aparato, ahí solo es agua natural, solo cuando terminas de fumigar con calor, aparte puedes espolvorear el polvo de ácido bórico, pero que no tenga contacto con tu piel, polvo de borax, también qué no tenga contacto con tu piel o la tierra de diatomeas qué es más seguro y puede tener contacto con tu piel y hasta con tus mascotas y también lo consigues en esta misma tienda ya dejarás de sufrir con esos animalitos que dan mucha lata, se los recomiendo mucho,viene en su estuche, todo ordenado y hasta, me llego antes de la entrega. Ojalá les sirva esta información.
